page.title: 03SCHOOL SOCIAL LIFE/WOODLAND
page.content: We make many{Educational Visits.}We } have been to the theatre, London, Bowlees,Durham Cathedral,Hadrians Wall,St Pauls Jarrow and Killhope Wheel to study lead mining.We visit the seaside once a year and study local environments including our wildlife garden. { Clubs}after School are Computer, football, badminton, craft, needlework and music. { Villagers}come to join us in our Service at Harvest Time and to watch us in our Christmas play where we act,sing and play music on percussion, recorders flute and clarinet. We go to{Area Sports}where we are joined by Hamsterley,Stanley and Witton-le-Wear.We take part in the {Football Tournament}for the G.B Bowley Small School Trophy in Barnard Castle.
